thought.text:
Perfect! Now I can see the exact issue. The error is:

```
UnicodeDecodeError: 'ascii' codec can't decode byte 0xc3 in position 0: ordinal not in range(128)
```

This happens because `to_native_string` tries to decode the UTF-8 bytes `b'\xc3\xb6\xc3\xb6\xc3\xb6'` using ASCII encoding, which fails.

task_list.notes: Found the issue in models.py line 84, _encode_params method

task_list.title: Phase 4: TEST CREATION - Create reproduction script

Phase 6: FIX IMPLEMENTATION - Implement the fix
